name: Motor Blaze
description:
Motor Blaze is a local multiplayer game based on the legendary Tron movie.

Features...!!!
- 4 Vs 4 Local Players
- 3 Multiplayer Modes:
- Destroyer King
- Recover the Flag
- King of the Hill
- 8 Colors for customization
- 6 Multiplayer Maps 
- 10 Single Player Maps 
- 12 Skills available

You can follow us here: https://www.facebook.com/MotorBlazeGame
Please tell us any suggestion that you consider appropriate.
